original_title: Will resign as COPF Chair: Mayantha confirms
original_body_lines: SJB MP Mayantha Dissanayake said today he would resign from the chair of the Committee on Public Finance.
He told a news conference that he would submit the letter of resignation to the Speaker shortly.

"I decided to submit my resignation as there is no unity among the members of the Public Finance committee and also it is my duty to obey the party leader no matter whether he is right or wrong" Dissanayake said.

Dissanayake was appointed Chairman of the Committee on Public Finance by the Committee of Selections last week despite the nomination of SJB MP Harsha De Silva for the post by the opposition. (Yohan Perera)
